data.event: Rock Island is situated along U.S. Highway 90A in Colorado County, approximately 12 miles southwest of Columbus and 15 miles west of Eagle Lake The area was settled in 1896 as part of a land promotion scheme on the Texas and New Orleans Railroad.
The survey and map of the community was completed on February 19, 1896.

event.title: was appointed the first postmaster of Rock Island on August 9, 1897

data.event: The petition was granted and Charles Petersen was appointed the first postmaster of Rock Island on August 9, 1897.
The population of Rock Island peaked in 1925 at around 500.
In the 1960s, the community suffered several fires that left large gaps in the former downtown.
It remained at that level through 2000.
